books

Class Book

  • java.lang.Object
    • books.Book
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Book>

    public class Book
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Book>
    This Class creates an object of Book. The book has a title, author, and year published. The class also has a method of get List that gets a list of books from a .csv file.
    Author:
    Carlos Martinez

      • getList

        public static java.util.List<Book> getList(java.lang.String file)
                                    throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        This method reads from a something.csv file and creates a list of books from it. The file must be organized by title,author,year or the file will not be able to organize and add the book to the list.
        Parameters:
        file - The name of the file it will read.
        Returns:
        A list of books it created while reading something.csv file.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - If the file is not found this exception will be thrown or catch.
